name: Cyber Cop: Radical Hacker Man
description:
Enter the ass kickin' shoes of Cyber cop in Cyber Cop : Radical Hacker man! In this short vertical slice project fight your way through cyber space to confront your sensei of the hacking arts and bust his Cyber terrorist cell!

This game IS Controller compatible! In fact we recommend you play with an xbox controller for maximum tubular fun! 

While this is the finished vertical slice, we might update little things here and there when we feel like it! So feel free to follow me on Instagram to find out when that happens ^_^

@Soul_Ant19
